title: Selena Gomez means business in plunging black suit with pearl choker necklace
text:
Hours after releasing a new track believed to be about Justin Bieber, his wife Hailey revealed she was listening to a song entitled I'll Kill You.

But Selena Gomez was shrugging off the coincidences while heading to a meeting in Burbank on Wednesday.

The songstress, 27, exuded confidence while working a plunging black suit with strappy heels as she headed to Burbank Studios.

She means business! Selena Gomez was shrugging off the cryptic coincidences while heading to a meeting in Burbank on Wednesday

Selena definitely looked like she meant business as she walked out into the sunshine, carrying a sophisticated white hand bag.

She added yet another chic touch with a pearl choker necklace and head full of loose, romantic waves that tumbled just above her chest.

Selena also complimented her complexion with a dash of rosy blush and smoky eye shadow.

The actress definitely looked as though she was feeling herself, and for good reason - she had just released some new music following a four year break from the spotlight to focus on her health.

Maker and shaker: The actress definitely looked as though she was feeling herself, and for good reason - she had just released some new music following a four year break to focus on her health

Coincidence? Fans started speculating Hailey was directly responding to Selena when she revealed she was listening to the song, I'll Kill You

Lose You To Love Me was released Wednesday at midnight, and the song appears to be about her failed relationship with Justin.

Lyrics seemingly reference the short amount of time it took for Justin to move on from Selena to Hailey.

'You turned me down and now it's showing / In two months, you replaced us / Like it was easy / Made me think I deserved it.'

Man and wife: Bieber rekindled his relationship with his now-wife Hailey shortly after the end of his relationship with Gomez

Shortly after the song was officially released, Hailey shared a screenshot of a Summer Walker song she was listening to entitled I'll Kill You.

Fans were quick to begin speculating the song was a response to Selena's newly released track.

'Selena Gomez released a song (stream for clear skin) about her life experiences w an ex and leaving him behind (Justin Bieber now married to Hailey Baldwin) and like 5 minutes later Hailey Baldwin posted this. It’s not the first time she’s shaded her and probably not the last,' wrote one Twitter user.

Hmm...: Twitter users began speculating if Hailey was directly responding to Gomez's new song

Another commented, 'I'm not trying to start any drama and I've never talked about Hailey Baldwin before I have neutral feelings for her first, I've never believed the things that Selenators says about her until now, I mean it's not a coincidence to post this story right after the song is dropped -1.'

But Hailey shut down the speculation on Instagram, insisting the song was not a 'response' to Selena.

'Please stop with this nonsense... there is no "response." This is complete BS,' she wrote in a since-deleted comment in a post about the drama.

Denial: Bieber insisted the track was not a response to Lose You To Love Me
description: The songstress, 27, exuded confidence while working a plunging black suit with strappy heels as she headed to Burbank Studios. Selena definitely looked like she meant business.
